text: Mwebwe mwemeye Imana yanyu y’ukuri, ntimugire abansi banje hamwe n’abansi banyu kuba aribo bagenzi banyu mushikiriza inkuru zanyu kubera ubugenzi bwanyu gusa, mugihe bahakana ukuri kwama kwabashikiye n’ukwirukana intumwa y’Imana hamwe namwe, kubera yuko mwemera Imana ariyo muremyi wanyu, n’igihe mwitanze mugiye k’urugamba ariyo nzira yanje, n’ukurondera ikigongwe canje, muca mutanga amabanga yanyu y’ingwano kubera urukundo rwanyu mubafitiye, ntimusubire kugira ivyo, nanje ndafise ubumenyi bw’ivyo munyegeza hamwe n’ivyo muserura, rero n’uwugira ivyo vyose muri mwebwe amenye yuko yataye inzira y’ukuri
